reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Youth girls (age 15-24 years old) is one of the parties which requires improvement in skill through training to overcome unemployment and social difference in Aceh. This proposed training is differ with the training which conducted during the time, at leas t from three things: 1) Training will be conducted based on Community Employment Assessment (CEA) will be conducted by PKPA and non formal education (NFE) in order to identify what kind of job is required by the industry. 2) In the framework of improving local society capacities and sustainability of activity, skill training will be conducted in Center Activities of Learn Society and Training Providers in activity location
